casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. FONTAIN
v.
NESTOR 2019-0597 Supreme Court of Ohio. July 24, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENT

O'Connor, C.J., and Kennedy, French, Fischer, DeWine, Donnelly, and Stewart, JJ., concur.

MERIT DECISION WITHOUT OPINION

On respondent Judge Terry Nestor's motion to dismiss. Motion granted. Cause dismissed. Relator's amended motion for emergency stay and renewed motion for emergency stay denied.
